transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, speaking ho gaya 6.9.
Customer: Haan ji boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan haan very good afternoon sir. Main Shubham baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se aapka naya account manager. Aapne bhi ticket raise ki thi account manager team karne ke liye. Ji ji Shubham Thakur naam hai mera sir. To abhi aapko koi bhi ji ji aap sir ko koi bhi issue hota hai na for regarding services ya package ke regarding ya package ke regarding ya koi bhi aapka catalog me issues hota hai to aap directly is number pe aap call kar lijiyega. Mera number save kar lijiye. Ya to kabhi aap ye wo company wala number to nahi hai na matlab isse normal call lagega na ispe?
Executive: Haan haan sir ye personal number hai mera. This is not a company only. But maine abhi jo call kiya aapko virtual number se call kiya company ke haan company call ke regarding call kiya. But ye mere personal number hai. To main is number se aapko whatsapp bhi kar deta hu apna high drop kar deta hu aur aapke jo bhi feedback karte bhej deta hu. Right? Aapke date aapko kabhi bhi do mahine hue hai.
Customer: Ji ji. Do mahine hue hai mere ko jude hue but mere ko abhi tak kuch inquiry aayi nahi na call aaya koi. Thoda sa mera ye profile bhi thodi si change karni hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Setting wetting kis mein kya karna hai dalna hai thoda sa aap dekhiyega taki thoda hmm hmm working ho meri.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Actually main hi aapka na catalog bhi go through kar raha tha abhi. To sometime thoda dekha tha maine total aapke 16 product yaha pe listed hai. Aur 11 product hai na kuch description milta hai. To kabhi agar aapko valuable time mile to aap hum log baith ke ek bar meeting kar lete hain aur thoda dekh lete hain isko kaise theek kara ja sakta hai. Aur main aapko thoda naya cheez bataunga kaise isko aur valuable time ke hisab se aap acha khasa business generate kar sakte ho. Kyunki actually hamare IndiaMART pe kuch changes hue hai sir. Aap pan India deal karte hain local karte hain.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir aap pan India deal karte hain ki local karte hain business?
Customer: Nahi nahi pura all over India.
Executive: All over India karte hain na. So kabhi bhi agar aap valid aap consume karenge na sir to thoda sa main aapko ek feedback de deta hu market ke regarding aap laptop se valid consume kariyega. Waise to laptop se hi karte honge sir ya phone se karte hain sir?
Customer: Main mobile phone se karta hu.
Executive: Phone se karte hain na. But koi issue nahi hai phone se kar sakte hain but starting ke kuch sometimes one to days ke around aap phone se mat karke laptop se kariyega reason batata hu sir kyun. Kyunki IndiaMART pe na kuch changes hue hai uska reason bata raha hu kyunki aapne notice kiya hoga laptop se kabhi bhi aap aayenge left hand side pe na aapko valid ka option dikhta hoga. Right sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Kabhi aap laptop se ha laptop se parallel open karenge na IndiaMART ka usme left hand side pe na valid ka option dikhta hoga. Us valid se aapko kya karna hai do option show karenge valid pe jane ke baad ek relevent aur recent valid right? Kyunki mostly log jo har koi use karte hi hai. But relevent main ek minute aapko 10-15 minute me karu kya call aapko?
Executive: Actually kya hai sir I have known actually I have known issue sir but jo aapki ticket raise hui hai na usko mujhe close karna hai to main isliye aap se janna chah raha tha ki aapko satisfaction hai kyunki aapne call kiya tha account manager change karne ke liye. To main account manager to humne change kar diya agar aapko tab se koi issue nahi hai to main concern clear kar du close kar du?
Customer: Ji ji kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan concern to close kar de na baki aapko kabhi koi issue lagta hai na aap directly mujhe call kar lijiyega aur aap whatsapp pe bhi main aapko high drop kar deta hu waha bhi direct aap mujhe message dal sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Okay.
Executive: Aur main aapko kab call kar sakta hu?
Executive: Sir agar before 6 ho jaye to best hai sir because 6 o clock ke baad to office close ho jate hain. Agar time rehta hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Kyunki ek particular time ke baad to hum bhi nahi jaen. Ye to early morning aap kal kar lijiyega jab bhi aap free hote hain.
Customer: Shubham aapke paas night mein sir.
Executive: Achcha main aapko 10 minute mein kar raha hu aapko sir na.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Main 10 minute mein aapko kar hi raha hu.
Executive: Haan no issue sir baki aapka concern clear kar deta hu concern ke liye maine aapko call kiya tha abhi concern isko close kar deta hu right ticket jo mujhe close karne ke liye 96 pe call kiya tha na account ke liye to wo aapka concern clear ho gaya to aapke paas na senior call aayega. To wo apne according aap bata dijiyega jo aapko clear karna tha uske according aap satisfy hai ki nahi hai baki aapka account manager hi hai to aap satisfy kar dijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any inquiries or calls.

- Wants to change his profile.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to help with profile changes.

- Executive shared his personal number for direct contact.

- Executive will send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Account manager changed as requested.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call back in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, catalog, account manager, buyleads
